AEADBadTagException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a AEADBadTagException with the specified detail message.

AEADBadTagException().Description: Constructs a AEADBadTagException with no detail message.

ClassDesc: This exception is thrown when a @B_javax#crypto#Cipher_E@ operating in an AEAD mode (such as GCM/CCM) is unable to verify the supplied authentication tag.
